title: Freedom4All
author: Freedom4All
content: Hello!I offer space on my website to place paid blog posts/ads for good initiatives related to cryptocurrencies, privacy, and other goods or services that align with the readers.The website is aimed at Dutch-speaking readers. It is a news and opinion website, set up on October 1, 2019.The website has an average of a thousand unique visitors per day. 3.600+ Post Notification Subscribers. (The inactive devices are filtered out on a monthly basis.) and a Twitter account attached to it where all articles are shared.Casino-related content might be possible. But not too overwhelming. And it must be legal.Depending on the wishes and the length, the normal price for a blog post is $140.But there are many possibilities and it depends on the niche.The website is:https://commonsensetv.nlEdit: If this is not the proper place to post this offer, tips are appreciated.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: I've checked your website and wonder why there is no page dedicated to advertisers, you're looking for advertisers but maybe one of your visitors who do not come from Bitcointalk wants to advertise but they do not have any idea if you're accepting advertisers because there is still none on your website, why not just create an advertiser widget and redirect it to a page where all the details on putting advertisement and benefits advertisers are going to get.
